text:
With the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show just moments away, models walking this year's extravaganza had an early start this morning as they made their way backstage for preening.

Taking place in Shanghai for the first time in the runway's history, the showcase kicks off at 8pm local time - 12pm GMT.

Joining the models this year for her second VS fashion show is Bella Hadid.

Having made her debut walking for the lingerie giant in Paris last year alongside older sister Gigi, Bella this year is the only Hadid walking after Gigi pulled out just last week.

Also absent this year is the Hadid sisters' good friend Kendall Jenner, who is skipping this year due to a contractual agreement with rival lingerie brand La Perla of which she is the face.

But while Gigi and Kendall are notable absences from this year's line up, there is a smorgasbord of well-known and legendary Victoria's Secret models returning to the runway today.

Adriana Lima, Alessandra Ambrosio, Jasmine Tookes, and Stella Maxwell are all in Shanghai for the show, while Candice Swanepoel regains her place having stepped away from the catwalk for 2016 to have her baby.

Karlie Kloss also returns to the line up having left the brand two years ago.

Photographed together backstage, the girls joined the brand's first ever high fashion runway collaborator Olivier Rousteing of Balmain ahead of today's debut.

Take a look through our gallery above to see the models as they prepare backstage for one of the biggest catwalk shows of the year
title: Victoria's Secret Fashion Show 2017: Bella Hadid joins Adriana Lima and Alessandra Ambrosio backstage
